caption:
A possibly fabric chandelier with white and spherical shape. Composed of numerous thin, radiating elements creating a textured appearance. Likely serves as an ornamental light fixture. Suspended above a bed in a bedroom setting with modern furnishings.

Inconclusive evidence for the material due to image resolution, but the structure suggests a decorative purpose. The surrounding objects include a bed with pillows, a nightstand, and other bedroom furniture, reinforcing its role as a central lighting feature in the room.
